entry.title: Sapanu
entry.content:
In the 1990s an interesting and ambitious series of online publications began to appear under the rubric of Sapanu. Publicaciones en Internet del Laboratorio de Hermeneumática. Some of these eventually appeared in print form, and all of the internet versions disappeared. For some years there were versions of some of them accesible via the Internet Archive's Wayback Machine. Eventually (at lest to the best of my knowledge), even the Wayback Macines archive ceased to work for these links.

In an exchange yesterday on ANE-2, colleagues resurfaced first one component of Sapanu, the Amarna Tablet Photograph Database listed in AWOL yesterday afternoon.  Later that afternoon, another component was brought to light:

Sapanu 2004


Not all of the constituent parts listed there remain accessible online, but the following are active at the moment:
Banco de Datos Filológicos Semíticos Noroccidentales XIII: J.-L. CUNCHILLOS y R. CERVIGÓN, Palabras y Géneros, Madrid 2004.

Las tablillas de El Amarna en el Vorderasiatisches Museum de Berlín. ISBN: 84-933230-4-7.

J.-L. CUNCHILLOS, J.- P. VITA, J.-Á. ZAMORA y R. CERVIGÓN (aplicación informática), A CONCORDANCE OF UGARITIC WORDS, Versión española, Madrid, 2003. 

UNESCRITO Y VARIOSTEXTOS, INFORMÁTICA Y F ILOLOGÍA: Recensión del text ougarítico, JESÚS - LUIS CUNCHILLOS, JUAN - PABLO VITA, CONSEJO SUPERIOR DE INVESTIGACIONES CIENTÍFICAS, MADRID, 2002.

A. González Prats, "La Fonteta. La colonia fenicia de la desembocadura del río Segura", Sapanu.Publicaciones en Internet III y IV (1999-2000)
EL DESARROLLO DE SOFTWARE PARA EL ESTUDIO FILOLÓGICO DE TEXTOS SEMÍTICOS ANTIGUOS, Joaquín A. Siabra Fraile
If you know of other components of Sapanu, please send a comment.
